alert.note: Alert for Fayette (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 19 at 11:14AM CST by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Fayette County through NOON CST... At 1114 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near La Grange, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... La Grange, Fayetteville, Round Top, Carmine, Swiss Alp, Rutersville, Warrenton, O`Quinn, Waldeck, Rabbs Prairie, Ellinger, Walhalla, Willow Springs, Ammannsville, Winedale, Rek Hill, Mullins Prairie, Nechanitz and Holman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
